name: Stardust Raiders
description:
3D on rails shooter game prototype, developed as a final project for the bachelor degree in Informatics Engineering. The game was developed on Unity 2017.3. and 2018.1.

You can download the latest build for Windows, Linux or Mac. Also the whole Unity project is available. The project files are from Unity 2018.1 and the scripts were coded with Visual Studio 2017.

Please, consider filling the following forms to help to improve the prototype, one is to give a review and the other one to report bugs/errors:

In English:

-Review: https://goo.gl/forms/i7WKKkdp1zC9uKs43

-Bug/error reporting: https://goo.gl/forms/d8vO0UJ7VlP7kEGq1

In Spanish:

-Reseña: https://goo.gl/forms/jzHPSyYg4sLDt1362

-Reporte de bugs/errores: https://goo.gl/forms/fFim2M4iWg8QnKG32

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art (Backgrounds & Titles): Amaya Mateos - https://www.instagram.com/amayou.art/
